title: Integrating Emotion and Learning: Design Strategies for Mathematics Education Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Secondary Mathematics Core Concepts and Fundamental Instructional Design Knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical training for pre-service and in-service teachers on integrating emotional elements into mathematics educational materials development. Conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the difference in effectiveness between theme-relevant and general emotional elements when integrating emotion into math educational materials.
Learners can design two or more specific methods for applying theme-specific emotional elements (characters/colors) to math concept explanation slides.
Learners can measure the effectiveness (retention/transfer) of materials developed through project-based assessment using self-evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
